name: Master of Business Administration

curriculum.title: Strategic Management
curriculum.description: This course covers the fundamentals of strategic management, including strategy formulation, implementation, and evaluation.

curriculum.title: Financial Accounting
curriculum.description: An in-depth study of financial accounting principles and practices, focusing on the preparation and analysis of financial statements.

admission: Bachelor's degree in any field, minimum 3 years of work experience, GMAT/GRE scores, English proficiency test scores (TOEFL/IELTS).
description: This is a small description about the course.

name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

curriculum.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
curriculum.description: This course introduces the fundamental data structures and algorithms used in computer science, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.

curriculum.title: Operating Systems
curriculum.description: An overview of operating system concepts, including process management, memory management, file systems, and security.

admission: High school diploma or equivalent, SAT/ACT scores, English proficiency test scores (TOEFL/IELTS).
description: This is a small description about the course.

name: Master of Science in Data Science

curriculum.title: Machine Learning
curriculum.description: This course covers the principles and techniques of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning.

curriculum.title: Big Data Analytics
curriculum.description: An introduction to big data technologies and tools, including Hadoop, Spark, and NoSQL databases.

admission: Bachelor's degree in a related field, minimum 2 years of work experience, English proficiency test scores (TOEFL/IELTS).
description: This is a small description about the course.

name: Bachelor of Arts in Psychology

curriculum.title: Introduction to Psychology
curriculum.description: This course provides an overview of the major concepts, theories, and research findings in psychology.

curriculum.title: Abnormal Psychology
curriculum.description: An examination of psychological disorders, including their symptoms, causes, and treatments.

admission: High school diploma or equivalent, SAT/ACT scores, English proficiency test scores (TOEFL/IELTS).
description: This is a small description about the course.

name: Master of Public Health

curriculum.title: Epidemiology
curriculum.description: This course covers the principles and methods of epidemiology, including study design, data collection, and data analysis.

curriculum.title: Health Policy and Management
curriculum.description: An overview of health policy and management, including the organization, financing, and delivery of health services.

admission: Bachelor's degree in a related field, minimum 2 years of work experience, English proficiency test scores (TOEFL/IELTS).
description: This is a small description about the course.
